title: Ukrainian President Zelenskyy in UK for meeting with European allies on missile support.

scene_plan.wide_context: A sweeping shot of the UK skyline with a backdrop that subtly incorporates symbols representing unity and strength, such as interlocked shields or linked chains.

scene_plan.impact_close: Zelenskyy standing confidently in front of an assembled group of European leaders. The camera zooms into his face to capture the determination etched on his features and a handshake with one leader, symbolizing solidarity.

scene_plan.data_overlay: Text overlay displaying key facts: 'Ukrainian President Zelenskyy meets EU leaders in London. Coalition of willing to discuss missile support.' Graphic showing a timeline or map highlighting the meeting location and participating countries.

scene_plan.quiet_outro: A soft focus on the camera as it pans out, leaving Zelenskyy's determined face in view before fading to black with an invitation for further discussion: 'Comment below.'

sora_prompt.voiceover: <brief factual narration>: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy is meeting today with European allies, including the UK. The coalition of willing discusses missile support and defense funding for Kyiv's ongoing efforts.
